newsitem.title: USA: NBA BASKETBALL-KINGS SIGN FIRST-ROUND PICK OLIVIER ST JEAN.
newsitem.headline: NBA BASKETBALL-KINGS SIGN FIRST-ROUND PICK OLIVIER ST JEAN.

text.p: The Sacramento Kings Tuesday signed their first-round draft pick, forward Olivier St. Jean, who was the 11th overall selection in last month's NBA draft.
St. Jean, the leading scorer in the Western Athletic Conference for San Jose State last season as a junior, averaged 23.8 points per game and 8.8 rebounds.
St. Jean is the first player to be drafted by an NBA club who was born and raised in France.
The 6-foot-5 (1.95 m) forward is expected to challenge Billy Owens for the starting small forward spot in the Kings lineup.
Owens averaged 11 points and 5.9 rebounds in 66 games for the Kings last season.
